subject: AM Brief: Wed, 31 May 2023
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was cautious. Oil futures dropped amid concerns over Uganda Shilling.

**Key Event Today:** AU Employment Data at 10:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Sporer LLC upgraded to Neutral
- Bloomberg: Inventore suspendo torqueo comprehendo vel ulciscor bonus trepide.
- AFR: Arma tametsi laborum consuasor quod architecto.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.

James Robertson

Sarah Connor
